A '''slave''' is an unnamed minor character in the [[Season 4|fourth season]]. He is played by guest star [[Joshua Sher]] and appears in "[[Breaker of Chains]]".
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 4]]===
He is one of the many slaves that gather over the walls of Meereen when [[Daenerys Targaryen]] and her army appear before the city gates to lay [[Siege of Meereen|siege]] to the city. After the death of Meereenese champion [[Oznak zo Pahl]] and Daenerys' words to the slaves present, he watches as a slave picks up one of the hundreds of broken slave collars thrown into the city in catapulted barrels. He then picks up the collar that belonged to a former slave and glances at [[Great Master 2|his master]].<ref>"[[Breaker of Chains]]"</ref>
